thread.title: PRC NTU SCHOLAR CALLS S'POREANS "UGLY, MISSHAPED & DISGUSTING"
thread.title_full: PRC NTU SCHOLAR CALLS S'POREANS "UGLY, MISSHAPED & DISGUSTING"

author: farhan
title: PRC NTU SCHOLAR CALLS S'POREANS "UGLY, MISSHAPED & DISGUSTING"
text:
PRC NTU SCHOLAR CALLS S'POREANS "UGLY, MISSHAPED & DISGUSTING"   Fri, 24/02/2017 - 10:23pm 
I'm a PRC lady, a scholarship holder, graduated from NTU in 2016. Recently I browsed one of my friend's QQ zone and found her 2 posts in the past. She is also a PRC scholarship holder from my batch in NTU. I'm shocked by her hostility towards Singapore and Singaporeans. Advertisement 
The direct translations of her posts are:"The more I think over it, the more fucking awful I find it is. 1400K RMB of guarantee deposit (to get rid of 6-year bond of working in Singapore). I fucking stay in this misshaped country to attend university for 4 years, which almost makes me vomiting. This country is unable to think. It's modern-time Sparta. It's awful to death. I fucking regret (coming to Singapore) fucking." 
“My level of hating Singapore and feeling disgusting towards it has already been above the sky. Disgusting transportation. Ugly and misshaped people. Singlish is scrannel to death. There’s no pleasure here at all. (I will) leave (Singapore) immediately after graduation, go to other countries for education and job hunting. It’s too disgusting too disgusting here.” 
I don't know whether I should agree with her point of view or not, since she's my friend. However, it’s a sure thing that she holds horrible hostility towards this country. 
Ji Wensan A.S.S. Contributor
